title: Eyes closed, nation watching: Trump’s mid-meeting snooze sparks buzz
shortDescription: Photos show President Trump appearing to nod off during a Cabinet meeting on Dec. 2.

title: Was Trump sleeping at the Cabinet meeting? Watch the video
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held a Cabinet meeting on Dec. 2, where footage shows him closing his eyes for long periods of time. Was he sleeping?

title: Tennessee sends 'warning signs' of blue wave for Trump and the GOP
shortDescription: Democratic party leaders are sounding increasingly optimistic about 2026, while Republicans are the ones expressing concerns of a midterm wipeout.

title: Trump appears to doze off during cabinet meeting
shortDescription: Donald Trump's eyes were very heavy during a three-hour long cabinet meeting. Press Sec. Karoline Leavitt said he was "listening attentively."

title: Trump pardons Congressman Henry Cuellar
shortDescription: Henry Cuellar, D-Texas, won an 11th term in November despite facing a federal indictment over charges that he took foreign bribes.

title: Trump freezes immigration from 19 nations
shortDescription: The Trump administration paused green cards, citizenship and visa processing for 19 countries already under a travel ban.

title: Photos show President Trump appearing to doze off in Cabinet meeting
shortDescription: New photos show President Donald Trump appearing to doze off at a Cabinet meeting this week.

title: Trump blasts Somalis as 'garbage' but local officials defend refugees
shortDescription: Trump blasted Somali immigrants as 'garbage' he doesn't want in the country. But Minnesota officials called the criticism 'racism' and 'un-American.'

title: White House rejects claims trump was dozing off during cabinet meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump faced accusations of dozing off during a cabinet meeting on Tuesday, December 2, after footage showed him with his eyes closed

title: Trump's immigration crackdown hits New Orleans
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security said the operation in New Orleans will target 'criminal illegal aliens.'

title: Jared Isaacman, Trump's NASA pick, faces Senate today. How to watch
shortDescription: Jared Isaacman will appear today for a Senate hearing ahead of a potential confirmation vote for him to become NASA's next administrator.

title: Trump threatens Venezuelan land strikes as tensions mount
shortDescription: There have been 21 U.S. military strikes against Venezuelan vessels since September, with 83 casualties, all without Congress’ approval or oversight.

title: Republican Matt Van Epps wins TN election
shortDescription: Republican Matt Van Epps avoided an upset and won Tennessee's 7th Congressional District. What does this mean for President Donald Trump and the GOP?

title: The moment US Capitol Christmas tree lights up
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson and other members of Congress participated in the Capitol Christmas tree lighting ceremony.

title: Trump claims he's fighting drug traffickers
shortDescription: Naming a group as a Specially Designated Global Terrorist gives Trump the authority to enact sanctions, not to kill in international waters.

title: See the US Capitol Christmas Tree lighting ceremony
shortDescription: The National Christmas Tree Lighting is an annual tradition dating back to 1923 under President Calvin Coolidge.

title: Sabrina Carpenter blasts White House over song use
shortDescription: Sabrina Carpenter called a White House video using her song “evil and disgusting.”

title: Van Epps wins closely watched Tennessee special election
shortDescription: Matt Van Epps' victory over Democrat Aftyn Behn was a potential warning sign for Republicans less than a year from the 2026 midterm elections.

title: Dell CEO gives $6 billion toward Trump’s ‘accounts for babies’
shortDescription: Babies born during Donald Trump's current term will get a head start on building wealth. The Trump accounts got a donation from Michael Dell. When?

title: Trump looks ahead to 2028 GOP nominee: 'It's not going to be me'
shortDescription: President Trump said he won't be the Republican 2028 presidential nominee, predicting his GOP successor will be one of his Cabinet secretaries.

title: See previous White House holiday decor from Melania Trump, Jill Biden
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump unveiled the White House Christmas decor this week. Jill Biden's decor from previous years have been resurfaced. See photos.
